CodeWarriorÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Development Studio for PSPÃ¢â€žÂ¢

Bring your PSPÃ¢â€žÂ¢ titles to market faster with CodeWarriorÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Development Studio for PSPÃ¢â€žÂ¢. CodeWarrior Development Studio for PSPÃ¢â€žÂ¢ offers a comprehensive and consistent environment for fast and easy application creation.  It includes a cross compiler for blazingly fast, high-quality object code, and a debugger that offers developers the quickest way to find showstoppers with an intuitive graphic interface for flexible and accurate debugging capabilities.


Benefits 
  
Using CodeWarrior Development Studio for PSPÃ¢â€žÂ¢, developers have the option to develop within the native CodeWarrior development environment, or integrate with the Visual StudioÃ‚Â® .NET environment. In addition, CodeWarrior Development Studio for PSP makes it easy to port your code from the PlayStationÃ‚Â®2 to the "PSPÃ¢â€žÂ¢
device.

 
   

   
Detailed Features 
  
C/C++ Compiler/Libraries
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ANSI-compliant C/C++ compiler
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ANSI-standard runtime libraries for C/C++ 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ GNU Build Tool Adapters
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compiler generates debugging information in DWARF format

Assembler
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Metrowerks PSP stand-alone assembler
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easy to use syntax
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compatible with the GNU assembler that is part of the PSP SDK
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PSP inline assembler supports function-level inline assembly and inline assembly within functions

Linker
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ C/C++ linker
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Link object code into ELF format
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Linker displays memory map, address location, and value of each linker generated symbol
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Aggressively deadstrips unused symbols
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Date and time-stamp linker feature to embed date/time of build to the final executable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Linker supports an additional preference panel, "ELF Disassembler" allowing you to specify what appears in the disassembly output
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ BatchRunner / Postlinker Ã¢â‚¬â€ enables execution of batch files after build completion

CodeWarrior Integrated Debugger
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Metrowerks C/C++ debugger supports DECI2 and is compatible with Sony's PSP Development Kit and Emulator
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for enhanced types of breakpoints called Eventpoints
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Debugs CodeWarrior DWARF formats
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Source/assembly/mixed-mode views
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to set breakpoints in editor before debugging
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fill memory range with specified argument

CodeWarrior IDE
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Project files organized in Project Manager enabling easy navigation and organization of source files.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customizable workspace environment Ã¢â‚¬â€ ability to automatically load open projects and windows on separate invocations of the IDE
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Developers can arrange their projects as they choose using the GUI
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fully configurable text editor interface, enabling developers to customize toolbars and key bindings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ C/C++ code completion
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search engine provides fast navigation of code structures
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Find-and-compare operations on project folders during builds
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Integrated support for Sony's SDK
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tree-based register views
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Metrowerks command line adapters for Sony's GNU based build tools

Plug-ins/Integration
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Visual Studio .NET integration
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open API for integrating third-party tools
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ VSS, CVS, alienbrain, and Perforce plug-ins

Services and Technical Support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Metrowerks online support is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and
provides the ability to:
       Ã‚Â° download product updates
       Ã‚Â° check the status of support requests
       Ã‚Â° view your account information
       Ã‚Â° access online knowledge base for frequently asked questions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Technical support is available via telephone and email during regular business hours
